original_text: The nations have heard of thy shame, and thy cry hath filled the land: for the mighty man hath stumbled against the mighty, and they are fallen both together.
korean_text: 네 수치가 나라들에 들렸고 네 부르짖음은 땅에 가득하였나니 용사가 용사에게 걸려 넘어져 둘이 함께 엎드러졌음이라

sentences.original_text: The nations have heard of thy shame
and thy cry hath filled the land
for the mighty man hath stumbled against the mighty
and they are fallen both together
